title: [nutcracko] I think this is a bug

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
To my knowladge nutcracko's skin splash art looked like this after the update:

https://imgur.com/a/FaLC9

In my friends' game he managed to find this (no customs skins)
https://imgur.com/a/0CRR2

Is this a bug or me not seeing something in the patch notes?
An explanation would be nice

replies.body:
Hey! 

Looks like the player has the vintage border for this particular skin (the watermark), which means that he'd also have the vintage splash as well. :)
Vintage splashes?? I'm not sure I've ever heard of those but ({{champion:16}}) hey ({{champion:40}}), *hints* {{champion:43}} *at* ({{champion:76}}) *something*, that looks pretty good.

They are only on special skins that had been previously Limited Edtions. So no, none of those champs would fit that except for Nidalee's Bewitching Nidalee skin (but who'd want that old one when the new splash is AMAZING).

https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/plan-vintage-limited-edition-skins

ahh makes sense then

and I was kinda just joking m8 :P
